title: Complex overlapping events
prompt: Create a financial scenario starting in January 2024, running for 6 months. Starting cash: $10,000. Monthly takehome: $5,000, baseline expenses: $2,000. Add rent of $2,000 starting immediately and continuing. Add a one-time bonus of $5,000 in March. Add medical expenses of $1,000 starting in February for 3 months.
